From the brand

Aterod

Enjoy Pleasure When Gardening with Our Expandable Water Hose!

Aterod is a manufacturer specializing in the research, development, production and sales of garden water pipes. Our goal is to provide every guest with a safe and durable expandable garden hose that allows guests to enjoy gardening time.

Aterod Black Garden Hose

Atreod Expandable Hose

Amazing durability, lightweight hoses.
Solid brass connectors.
10 functional nozzle.
Easy to use and store.

Read more

About Aterod

We specialize in horticultural products. Every product from Aterod was created with one consistent mission – Enjoy pleasure when gardening. At Aterod, we work passionately to create products with simplicity and usability.

Warning: After the water source is turned off, the hose will shrink, the changed water pressure may cause the faucet to shrink irregularly. Keep children away before turning off water to avoid unexpected harm to the surrounding people.

Garden Hose with 10-pattern Sprayer Nozzle

Water hose is a must for easy outdoor work. Are you looking for a hose to wash your dirty car, wall, outdoor windows, pets and water your garden? You may also have been tired of the traditional short poor-quality plastic hose, hoping to get longer service lift. Now, there is unmissable chance for you to try our Expandable Water Hose.

  • Expands 3 times its length when water pressure is on
  • Self drains itself when not in use
  • No tangles, twists or hinks
  • Easy to store in very small places

Read more

Features

Car Washing

When was the last time you had fun washing your car? With this water hose, one thing you can be sure of is having fun. If you have been putting off washing your car due to it being a boring task then this water hose is for you. You can enjoy the car wash in your garage.

Watering Flowers/Vegetables

The hose grows long and super strong enough for any size job. Perfect for gardens, terraces, patios and more, you just turn on the water and watch the hose grow and grow and grow. Enjoy gardening and want to keep your garden hydrated.

Pets washing

With this water hose, the Pet Sprayer provides an easy and effective way to wash your pet minus the frustrating leaks from inferior craftsmanship in the past. Make Your Pet Enjoy Bath and Massage with Ease.

Read more

Washing Windows/Walls/Floor/Fish Tank/Boat, etc.

This water hose is easy to assemble, transport, lightweight, convenient and powerful enough for most smaller jobs like cleaning screens, small porches, walls, floor, garage, etc. Perfect for many applications including cleaning windows, ATVS, motos, decks and other areas around the hose.

Read more

}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

if (!input) {

Outdoor Faucet Covers for Winter, 2 PCS 6″Wx 9″H Reusable Outside Faucet Insulated Cover Socks, Freeze Protection Garden Hose Cover Socks for Wall Taps Outside
【High Compatibility】 Faucet cover measures 9in x 6in, 2.3 inch thick. It is about 1-2 inch larger and 1inch thicker than most of other faucet socks. Works well with various faucet types, such as garden spigots, hose bibs, water tap, keep faucets protected in freezing weather.
【Quick & Easy Installtion 】 The faucet socks with Velcro straps are easy to put on and take off even you wear gloves in cold winter. Simply pull the cover over the faucet/tap and fasten it tightly with the Velcro strap. A few seconds is all it takes!
【Superior Protection】 Very thick faucet cover design. In winter protecting your outside faucets from freezing and bursting. In summer prevent faucets from the blazing sun or the rust. Help save costly repairs. It has the functions of antifreeze, rainproof, snowproof, sun exposure, windproof and dust prevention.
【Super Waterproof & Insulation】The water faucet cover for winter is constructed of 3 layers – 210D oxford cloth waterproof coating thicker insulated silk cotton 190t taffeta waterproof coating, making it durable and reusable season after season. effectively keep the faucet dry and warm during.
【Please Confirm Again】You will receive 2 pack faucet protective covers. Please measure the size before purchase,If you don’t know the size of your faucet, you can try to buy. It works well with various faucet types. If you have any questions, please contact us in time. We will reply within 24 hours.

From the brand

Founded in 2015, Sealegend is focused on helping people reduce cleaning burdens, reduce safety hazards and improve the happiness.

Sealegend’s mission is to provide quality and cost-effective products, spread home cleaning concepts and a healthy lifestyle.

We have been working on dryer vent cleaning products and our products have reached a good use function. In order to meet different customer needs, we have also developed more different styles.

Why was the brand sealegend born?

As we all know, the dryers are a must-have electrical appliance in every household, but the long-term lack of cleaning of dryers is also the main cause of annual fires. Therefore, in order to solve the confusion and safety problems of daily cleaning, we began to develop convenient and efficient cleaning kit for dryers, and the Sealegend brand was born.

What makes our products different?

Every Sealegend product is carefully developed by our R&D department. Through a lot of market research, we continue to come up with ideas to solve customer problems, so as to produce suitable products.

What problem are we solving?

Save money and provide effective cleaning tools. Helps solve lots of difficult-to-clean problems.

Dryer vent cleaner kit

Vent Cleaner Kit Lint Remover

Dryer Vacuum Attachment

[New design]-Essential for Dryer Vent-Our long attachment hose attaches to your vacuum and lets you clean the deep recesses of your appliances. Perfect for your washing machine, dryer, freeze dryer machine, and more can run more efficiently. Flexible and handy hose is perfect for removing lint build-up beyond you can’t reach
[Improve Dryer Performance] The dryer that cannot be cleaned for many years accumulates a lot of dirt. The vents will become narrow or even blocked. Our dryer lint vacuum attachment can clean the vents effectively and make your equipment runs more efficiently
[Helps Prevent Fires] The dust lint is the main cause of fire in the dryer. Every year there are tens of thousands of fires caused by the failure of the dryer. So we need this dryer vent cleaner kit to keep cleaning of the dryer and prevent fires
[A Cost-Effective Cleaning Kit] Dryer Lint Cleaner kit adds years to your appliances. You will have saved more money in cleaning and maintenance costs. Not only that, but you are helping them avoid lint fires. Keep them safe and protect the performance of dryer. It is valuable for you to choose this dryer vent vacuum hose
[2 Types of Hoses can be Switched for Use] In order to adapt to different dryer vents, we provide two types of hoses. When switching use, you only need to remove the adapter and the hose connection to connect to the corresponding long hose.

***In order to adapt to different dryer vents, we provide two types of hoses.

***When switching use, you only need to remove the adapter and the hose connection and then connect to the corresponding long hose.

1. What do you get ?

One round hose with guide wire, one flat hose, and one adpater.

Paid one and you can get more kinds of way to clean your dryer easy and effectively

2. What can this Dryer Vent Vacuum Cleaner Attachment help you?

(1)This dryer vent cleaner can attached to your vacuum and reach to fit into the narrow crevice of your machine. Don’t worry about the corner you can’t clean.

(2)This attachment is a time and money saver! It makes dryer cleaning extremely fast and easy.

(3)Before this, cleaning the dryer maybe a nightmare. And you always ingnore to clean the dryer vent. Now this attachment is a time and money saver for you ! It makes dryer cleaning extremely fast and easy.

(4)If there something wrong with my filter vent in my dryer, You don’t need to buy a new filter vent and firstly just use the dryer vent Cleaner Kit to clean vent and get away from the a mess lint in bottom of filter.

Multiple Using Features

From the brand

Giraffe Tools

Gear that works hard so you don’t have to

Giraffe Tools is the global leader in Hose & Hose Reel. Our products aim to truly benefit our consumer’s daily lives. Giraffe Tools insistence on automatic retraction technology in hose reel / pressure washer / cord reel industries has allowed the brand’s products to maintain its outstanding quality for more than decades.

Shop more garden hose

What makes our products unique?

Giraffe Tools has complete sets of modernized production facilities, much-specialized personnel and reputable designers.

Why do we love what we do?

Our team is constantly making a concerted effort to keep pushing forward in the pursuit of creating exceptional products that add value to everyday lives.

What problem are we solving?

Under our strict quality-monitoring framework, all products pass multiple inspection processes which provides consumers more safeguard.

Wide Applications: The water hose can be cut to whatever length you want. Long enough to clean roof, front and back yard, and short enough to be a lead-in hose.
NO KINK: The newest material is memoryless, the heavy duty hose will not kink, and easily coil and uncoil. The 3-layers design allows the hose to remain flexible under extreme temperatures.
Lightweight and Durable: Using the latest hybrid material from rubber and polymer, it is much lighter, more durable, and wear-resistant than the traditional rubber hose.
Special Design: The amazing part of this hose is that it can be re-used. If one part is broken, you can cut it off, and get the fittings re-connected. This one hose can be used throughout your whole lifetime. Great for garden, lawn, yard, car washing, and pets cleanings.
2-Year Limited Warranty: The Giraffe team has always been committed to improving the quality of life for everyone and enabling more families to enjoy the pleasures of the yard. All products are 2-year limited warranty for worry-free shopping.

Hybrid Garden Hose

  • All weather flexibility
  • Durable and wear resistant
  • 3/4in. brass plated fittings
  • Kink resistant
  • Lightweight
  • Easy to coil and uncoil
  • Leakproof with rubber washer

Customize Garden Hose Male to Female

Connector could be re-installed.

The hose can be cut to any length as you want.

If the hose may kink or leak, you could cut the defective part, and re-install the connector. Got a brand new hose.

Adapted the hybrid polymer material, makes the hose more lightweight, and flexible.

No kinks of the hose. Fulfill all your garden watering.

*6ft/15ft for leader hose

*25/50ft for watering plants and flowers

*75ft/100ft for cleaning roof and backyard

SOLID FITTING (Male & Female Ends)

  • Brass plating aluminum material, effectively prevent corrosion or wear, for a longer service life
  • 3/4″ large diameter connection for full and unobstructed water flow
  • Clear and standard threads, female end with washer to eliminate water leakage troubles

TESTED TOUGH

Its super strong flexible hybrid polymer material is abrasion-resistant. This hose has been tested rigorously to confirm burst strength and Durable. Giraffe hose owns longer life.

Product Description

Next Generation Garden Hoses!

Out with the old clumsy, kinking garden hose! The Joey’s garden hose features the latest in garden hose innovation. Inner latex core and outer elasticized fabric work together to form the ultimate garden hose. The Joeys Garden hose expands up to 3x its original size using standard water pressure and will shrink back to size when pressure is turned off. Superbly flexible, the hose will not kink or twist.

Our Garden Hose Features: Solid Brass Connectors Fits Any Standard Spigot 8 Pattern Hose Spray Nozzle Expandable Up To 3X Available in 4 Sizes

Hose Spray Nozzle Included

Included with every Joey’s garden hose is a hose spray nozzle. 8 patterns include vertical, flat, center, stream, mist, soaker, shower and cone patterns! Featuring a rubber handle, the nozzle is easy to grip.

Solid Brass Connectors

Our hoses are finished off with solid brass connectors to ensure an easy and secure fit with any standard spigot. Connectors will not warp or rust.

Expandable up to 3X

Featuring the latest in hose engineering, hour garden hose can stretch up to 3x using standard hose pressure. When pressure is turned off the hose will immediately shrink back to its original size.

Expandable up to 3X its size- Our garden hose can expand up to 3x under standard water pressure and then immediately shrink back to its original size for easy storage.
Solid Brass Connectors- Each hose is tipped with solid brass connectors to ensure the hose can screw on easily to any standard spigot.
Hose Spray Nozzle Included- 8 pattern hose spray nozzle has a rubber handle for easy grip.

Aquapaw bathing tools and lick mats take the scary out of things like baths and vet visits. Dogs love to ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $24.95
(as of Nov 29,2022 23:31:45 UTC – Details)

Product Description

MORE WAGS & MORE SMILES AQUAPAW PETS ARE HAPPY PETS

Among the dogs, cats, and other furry pals in our recent poll, Aquapaw is the paws-down favorite brand. Aquapaw bathing tools and lick mats take the scary out of things like baths and vet visits. Dogs love to smell good, of course, and Sparky’s skin doesn’t itch after an Aquapaw bath. Arf!

HAPPY PETS HAVE HAPPY HUMANS

Humans like it when their pets are happy. That’s why humans choose Aquapaw. Aquapaw baths are less messy than bucket baths. Vet visits and grooming sessions are just easier, with Slow Treater lick mats. And hey, it turns out humans also love it when dogs smell good. It’s a win-win situation.

EASY WAYS TO MAKE BATH TIME BETTER

1 Pro Pet Bather 2 Original Pet Bather 3 Slow Treater 4 Slow Treater XL 5 Feeding Mats

The Aquapaw Pet Bathing Tool

Simplify the dog bathing process at your home, with Aquapaw. Our combination sprayer/scrubber saves water, produces less mess, and helps your dog feel comfortable. All at the same time. Aquapaw is easy to install and operate. Can be used inside or outside.

PICK THE RIGHT SPRAYER FOR YOUR 4-LEGGED FRIEND

Original Sprayer

For cats & small dogs

Pro Sprayer

For all dogs

For horses & big dogs

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 3 x 8.79 x 87.74 inches; 12.8 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 07670
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 1, 2017
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Aquapaw
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B06Y3QSGWP

Eliminates mess and stress: As seen on Shark Tank, this all-in-one tool lets you brush and rinse your pet simultaneously, for faster bathing with no need for bucket rinsing. The button mechanism lets you click easily from ON to OFF with one hand, leaving your other hand free to soothe your pet
Indoor/outdoor use: Comes with adapters to fit shower spigot or garden hose, so you can easily create a small animal grooming station indoors in your tub or a large animal shower outside. Includes 8-foot hose
Ergonomic design: With its one-size-fits-all design, Aquapaw straps securely to either hand. The ON/OFF button rests in your palm, for ease of operation. The strap adjusts easily to fit all hand sizes
Quality materials and a great gift: The scrubber tool is 100% FDA-grade silicone – strong enough for scrubbing thick fur, yet soft enough to be gentle on your pet’s sensitive areas

MORE WAGS & MORE SMILES

AQUAPAW PETS ARE HAPPY PETS

Among the dogs, cats, and other furry pals in our recent poll, Aquapaw is the paws-down favorite brand. Aquapaw bathing tools and lick mats take the scary out of things like baths and vet visits. Dogs love to smell good, of course, and Sparky’s skin doesn’t itch after an Aquapaw bath. Arf!

HAPPY PETS HAVE HAPPY HUMANS

Humans like it when their pets are happy. That’s why humans choose Aquapaw. Aquapaw baths are less messy than bucket baths. Vet visits and grooming sessions are just easier, with Slow Treater lick mats. And hey, it turns out humans also love it when dogs smell good. It’s a win-win situation.
